thread.title: Glimmers of hope and a long wait for families of Colombia's missing

title: Glimmers of hope and a long wait for families of Colombia's missing
text:
Glimmers of hope and a long wait for families of Colombia's missing 11:21am GMT - 01:46 
Families of missing Colombians hope a DNA database will finally identify their lost loved ones. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Families of missing Colombians hope a DNA database will finally identify their lost loved ones. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EuEuQh
